__e: He's more dangerous than any of them.
Man, you're more dangerous than they are!
Who knows? The fear of the unknown is always worse than the actual thing.
Nothing more dangerous than a guy who already knows he's dead.
Oh, I wish I could take you, but coming with me is much more dangerous than staying here.
I don't wanna hear, "I told you so," but this is much more dangerous than I think.
It can be a dangerous place. But it's our last, best hope for peace.
You need to take care of yourself and be real careful because I think this could be a dangerous place. - You think?
The world is a dangerous place. And we must learn to defend ourselves from those who want to hurt us.
I wish I could help you, Kathy, I just can't. We're dealing here with the most dangerous man in the Continuum.
He's a very dangerous man, but we will handle him.
You're a dangerous man, to yourself and to others.
Nothing's more dangerous especially for an old man.
And now, on the day they are to be liberated, you send them on a mission which is far more dangerous than any other they have undertaken.
I see now that there is nothing more dangerous than men who have nothing left to lose.
The longer it takes to find her... the more dangerous she becomes.
Rides are getting dull. Ain't that the trap, Rico?
Except he now knows that I'm looking for him, and the closer I get, the more dangerous he becomes.
